<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slippers of Spider Climbing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=465)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These soft slippers are made of fine gray silk. If the slippers are left unattended for a while, they tend to attract spiders that nest inside.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** Tiny, hairlike tendrils extend from the slippers’ soles, allowing you to walk on vertical surfaces or even to move upside down along ceilings. For 1 minute, you gain a 20-foot climb Speed and you don’t need to use your hands to Climb. However, the slippers require decent traction for you to walk on a wall, so they provide no benefit when you’re moving across greased, icy, or oiled surfaces.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
